inclusion.criterion: women aged 16 to 49 at third trimester pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No medical record of chronic disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: who would stay next 1 year in the study area
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Would not stay in the study area
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with empty scrotum at the right side. Diagnostic laparoscopy showed an abdominal undescended testis.
